Give away!

I propagate my plants often, especially some fast growing types like Ceropegia woodii, and my Hoya carnosa mama.

The thing is, I can't really fit them all into my flat and on top of that I've landed up with quite a few of the same plant.

UK only - just pay postage :)

  1. Choose a plant
  2. Click on the link to email me
  3. I'll get back to you to arrange postage
  4. Transfer me the postage fee and track your new plant home :)

Why am I doing this? What's the catch?

No catch at all!

Plant swops occur all over the UK (and sometimes online or SM!), and unfortunatly they're all too far away from me. I don't have a car and I'm trifty, so setting out on an hour-long journey to a swop isn't always my vibe.

The plants I've listed here are the most easy-care in my collection, they're tough as nails and have been propagated many times already. If you'd like to give me a plant in return, we could put the postage fees to the side and do a mail-based swop instead!
